content: i designed the heath hand warmers to feature in a youtube tutorial aimed at beginner crocheters so i could share my love of crochet with others and hopefully help others get started in this wonderful fibre craft heart all you need is a couple of hours some dk yarn a hook some scissors and a darning needle you can watch the video taking you through every step in detail here 1 you can also find this pattern for free on my blog here 2 **or** you can purchase the detailed pattern with two size options no ads and links to each section of the video to help you every step of the way smiley if you are a seasoned crocheter you can whip up a pair of these mitts in a couple of hours the pattern is named for our local heathland where we spend many happy hours walking as a family i hope you enjoy making these happy hand warmer making 1 https //youtu be/k6ci8siqhf8 2 https //littledropsofwonderful blogspot com/2021/08/heath-hand-warmers-free-crochet-pattern html
